Value.TextValue: SELECT DISTINCT t1.sofi_nr AS '%RES_table_column_employeeID%' ,t1.[pers_nr] '%RES_table_column_employeeNumber%' ,t4.[e_roepnaam] AS '%RES_table_column_givenName%' ,t4.[naam_samen] AS '%RES_table_column_sn%' ,CASE 1 WHEN (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM [UMRA].[dbo].[tblEmployeeAccess] t6 LEFT JOIN [UMRA].[dbo].[tblAccessType] t7 ON t6.employeeAccessID = t7.AccessTypeID WHERE t7.accesstypeID = 1 -- AD AccessTypeID AND t6.employeeAccessBSN = t1.sofi_nr) THEN '%RES_status_yes%' ELSE '%RES_status_no%' END AS '%RES_ad_account%' ,CASE 1 WHEN (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM [UMRA].[dbo].[tblEmployeeAccess] t6 LEFT JOIN [UMRA].[dbo].[tblAccessType] t7 ON t6.employeeAccessID = t7.AccessTypeID WHERE t7.accesstypeID = 2 -- iProtect AccessTypeID AND t6.employeeAccessBSN = t1.sofi_nr) THEN '%RES_status_yes%' ELSE '%RES_status_no%' END AS '%RES_iprotect_account%' FROM [UMRA].[dbo].[tblBeaufortEmployeesContracts] t1 LEFT JOIN [UMRA].[dbo].[tblBeaufortDepartmentManagers] t2 ON t1.oe_kort_nm = t2.oe_kort_nm LEFT JOIN [UMRA].[dbo].[tblBeaufortEmployees] t3 ON t2.oe_mngr_pers_nr = t3.pers_nr LEFT JOIN [UMRA].[dbo].[tblBeaufortEmployees] t4 ON t1.sofi_nr = t4.sofi_nr --LEFT JOIN [UMRA].[dbo].[tblBeaufortDepartment] t5 ON t2.oe_kort_nm = t5.departmentCode WHERE t1.indnst_dt <= GETDATE() AND t1.uitdnst_dt >= GETDATE() AND (t1.uitdnst_dt_contract >= GETDATE() OR t1.uitdnst_dt_contract IS NULL) AND t2.[oe_mngr_sofi_nr] = '93275444' ORDER BY [naam_samen] ASC
